glosses: To go on a hunt, to go hunting, to search for prey.

examples.translation: The lion almost died while hunting.

examples.text: Çok ilginç avlanma tekniğine sahip 5 hayvan.
examples.translation: 5 animals with very interesting methods of hunting.

examples.text: Gece avlanırken bir ışık kaynağına ihtiyacınız olacak.
examples.translation: When you go hunting at night, you'll need a light source.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish آولانمق (avlanmak, “to be hunted, to be duped, to be suited to be used in hunting”), passive form of Ottoman Turkish آولامق (avlamak, “to hunt, to deceive, to dupe”). Morphologically from av (“prey, game”) + -le + -n (“passive and reflexive suffix”) + -mak. Cognate with Azerbaijani ovlanmaq.
